Name: Mini Cargo Truck
Desc: Mini Cargo Trucks may contain Dennies, materials, items, or even Polychromes and other rewards.
Desc2:
The Mini Cargo Truck: Your sturdiest safety net. A general logistics vehicle used by the HIA to deliver all kinds of supplies to aid Investigators in harvesting Ether resources. Some lost Mini Cargo Trucks will end up as a sweet bonus for Hollow Raiders looking around for loot.
If you see a lost Mini Cargo Truck, please use whatever is inside as you see fit... It's not like they'll fight back.
